definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 10:4 healing, cure, health (usu. fig.);—abs. [[מַרְפֵּא]] Je 14:19 +, [[מַרְפֵּה]] Je 8:15; cstr. [[מַרְפֵּא]] Pr 15:4;—
healing, cure, of national woes, Je 8:15, Je 14:19 b (‖[[שָׁלוֹם ]]), Je 36:6 (+ [[אֲרֻכָה]]); esp. ´[[אֵין לָנוּ מ]]: Je 14:19 there is no cure for us, ´[[עַר לְאֵין מ]]: 2Ch 36:16.

fig. of pers., health, profit, Pr 4:22 (‖[[הַּיִּים ]]), Pr 12:18, Pr 13:17, Pr 16:24; with spiritual implic. Mal 3:20; ´[[אֵין מ]]: Pr 6:15 = Pr 29:1; ´[[לֵב מ]]: Pr 14:30 a mind of health (healthy, composed, mind), cf. ´[[מ]]: alone = composure Ec 10:4; [[לְשׁוֹן]] ´[[מ]]: Pr 15:4 healing of the tongue, = a soothing tongue (Toy).
